== Vallachira (CT) (627865) ==

Vallachira (CT) is a town in the [[Thrissur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 6.02 sq. km. and harbouring 3144 households with total population of 12970 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 6 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 297 km. Male population is 6356 and female population is 6614. Scheduled Caste population is 1344 and Scheduled Tribes population is 10. Census Location Code of the town is 627865<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 6 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 100 km. Railway station is at Thrissur at a distance of 6 km.
